posts.description: Navajo Woman "Brandishing Scissors" Shot Five Times, Killed - Vocativ
How the FBI Monitored Crusty Punks, 'Anarchist Hangouts,' and an Organic Farmers' Market Under the Guise of Combating Terrorism
posts.extended: The FBI conducted a three-year investigation, dubbed "Seizing Thunder," into a animal-rights and environmental "terrorists" in the Pacific Northwest that devolved into widespread—and seemingly pointless—surveillance of activists for no apparent reason aside from the fact that they were anarch

posts.description: How News Genius Silences Writers | My business is generally pleasurable.
posts.extended: I moderate Facebook comments all day. While the rest of the Internet shuts off comments on publications, Facebook comments aren’t going anywhere—they count as engagement to help rank posts in the newsfeed, and there is no way for an admin to turn them off.

posts.description: Saul Williams - Ashes / Think Like They Book Say - 2/3/2016 - Paste Studios, New York, NY - YouTube
